attributes.action: Allowing The Public To Have More Of A Say Beyond The Votes
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to force the UK government to pay attention to voters beyond them voting. British citizens should have more say over the way the country is run, afteral,  this is OUR country! Sign this petition if you agree that:

1: Borders should be closed to immigrants
2: Public should have more say over social matters and economic decisions
3: There should be a reformation of government
4: There should be a reformation of benefits
5: There should be more housing for British citizens
6: There should be more opportunities for British young people
7: There should be more transparency within government offices

Please sign and start the change for more public input. The public do not have enough say over our country's future and instead have to put up with politician's babbling and lies!
It is time for the public to take back control of our country and have things the way we want them, instead of the things we don't want, forced down our throats!
